entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Overcast. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
